reg:regulation.reg:acttitle: Land Act; Motor Vehicle (All Terrain) Act
reg:regulation.reg:title: Prohibition Regulation No. 9

bcl:section.bcl:text: The use of snowmobiles is prohibited from December 15, 2002 to April 16, 2003 within the area outlined in heavy black on the attached map, with the following exceptions:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the trails shown in dashed lines;

bcl:section.bcl:text: The use of snowmobiles is prohibited, beginning in December 2003, from December 1 to April 16 within the area outlined in heavy black on the attached map, with the following exceptions:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the trails shown in dashed lines;

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation does not apply to public officials engaged in the discharge of their duties.

bcl:lefttext.in:em: Map exempt from publication, may be inspected at the Kootenay Regional Office, Ministry of Environment, 401-333 Victoria Street, Nelson, B.C., V1L 4K3.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Land Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 245, sections 66 and 110; Motor Vehicle (All Terrain) Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 319, section 7]
